name: The Rhythm Dungeon
description:
Enter The Rhythm Dungeon where you must slay monsters to the beat. Can you make it out alive?

This game was made in under 48 hours for Miz Jam 1.

Credits

  • Development - Pedro Custodio (yyam)
  • Song  "The Battle Continues" -  RushJet1 (Creative Commons Attribution-Noncommercial-Share Alike 3.0 United States License)
